snippet: For two days, Lazaro Allegue has scoured the waters of Miami's Biscayne Bay and combed the thick brush on nearby keys in search of his son....

headline.print_headline: Father of Missing Cuban Migrant Searching for Son
headline.main: Father of Missing Cuban Migrant Searching for Son

lead_paragraph: For two days, Lazaro Allegue has scoured the waters of Miami's Biscayne Bay and combed the thick brush on nearby keys in search of his son.
